name: Starcrossed (itch)
description:
Every thousand years, for those who know how to look, the stars align to create an arcane font of curious power. Once tapped by forces ancient and forgotten, all that remains are scant clues to magic unleashed by these forces in the past: ruins and hints of past civilisations scattered across untethered, floating "skylands." 

...which is exactly where you and your classmates are headed on a field trip today. Between the bad dreams you've been having lately, a recent mysterious accident on campus and whispered hints of a growing cult, you're a bit on edge, but you're sure those rumbles in the sky are just a storm blowing over....

Be transported to the magical world of Starsworn Academy, where the students are ecletic and the teacher is...murdered?! Solve the mystery through dialog and a hunt for clues before your ragtag group of students is slain, possessed or even worse...expelled.

Note: This game is an alpha release, with unfinished content and potential bugs blocking progression. Please follow this page to see updated builds as the game develops!

Authors:
  • Art: Feeshy
  • Audio: Yazorius
  • Design: Kate
  • Programming: Loressa
  • Writing: Mitchell, Loressa
